title: Inworld Basic Configuration Schema
description: Schema for validating Inworld graph JSON configuration. Checks the basic structure of the configuration.

components.description: List of components that can be used by graph nodes

subgraphs.description: List of subgraphs that can be referenced by SubgraphNode nodes

main.description: Main graph that serves as the entry point

parameters.description: List of parameters that can be passed to this graph with their types

nodes.description: List of nodes that make up the graph

edges.description: List of edges that connect nodes

start_nodes.description: List of node IDs that serve as entry points of the graph

end_nodes.description: List of node IDs that serve as exit points of the graph

id.description: Unique identifier of the main graph

nodes.description: List of nodes that make up the main graph

edges.description: List of edges that connect nodes

start_nodes.description: List of node IDs that serve as entry points of the graph

end_nodes.description: List of node IDs that serve as exit points of the graph

properties.description: Configuration object specific to the creation type

subgraph_id.description: ID of the graph to reference

parameters.description: Parameter values to pass to a subgraph

to_node_expression.description: CEL expression that evaluates to a node ID for conditional routing

to_nodes.description: List of possible target node IDs for conditional routing. Duplicates will be automatically removed.

condition_expression.description: CEL template expression for edge condition

condition_id.description: ID of a component that implements EdgeCondition

loop.description: Whether this edge creates a loop

oneOf.description: Conditional routing edge with expression-based destination. Cannot be combined with condition_expression, condition_id, or loop as it's ambiguous which expanded edges these would apply to.

max_new_tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate

max_prompt_length.description: Maximum length of the prompt in tokens

top_p.description: Probability for most probable tokens sampling

stop_sequences.description: List of sequences to stop generation

seed.description: Random seed for controlling the randomness of text generation

logit_bias.description: Logit bias to modify token likelihood

language_code.description: Language code for speech recognition, e.g., en, en-US, es-MX

AcousticEchoCancellationConfig.description: Configuration for acoustic echo cancellation, currently empty

ParsingConfig.description: Configuration for parsing documents into chunks

max_chars_per_chunk.description: Maximum number of characters per chunk

max_chunks_per_document.description: Maximum number of chunks per document

synonyms.description: List of synonyms for the rule

Entity.description: Entity definition for named entity recognition

rules.description: List of rules for the entity

embedding_similarity_threshold.description: Minimum similarity threshold for phrases to include in LLM prompt

max_embedding_matches_for_llm.description: Maximum number of embedding matches to include in LLM prompt

top_n_intents.description: Number of top-scoring intents to return

model_path.description: Path to the model weights file

model_name.description: Name of the model to use

endpoint_override.description: Endpoint override for the remote embedder

default_timeout.description: Default timeout for the remote embedder

model_path.description: Path to the model weights file

model_name.description: Name of the model to use

endpoint_override.description: Endpoint override for the remote LLM

default_timeout.description: Default timeout for the remote LLM

stt_model_path.description: Path to the STT model weights file

vad_model_path.description: Path to the VAD model weights file

endpoint_override.description: Endpoint override for the remote streaming STT

default_timeout.description: Default timeout for the remote streaming STT

model_path.description: Path to the model weights file

InworldServiceConfig.description: Configuration for Inworld remote STT service

endpoint_override.description: Endpoint override for the remote STT

default_timeout.description: Default timeout for the remote STT
Default timeout for the remote STT

synthesis_config.description: Speech synthesis configuration for the TTS model

endpoint_override.description: Endpoint override for the remote TTS

default_timeout.description: Default timeout for the remote TTS

model_path.description: Path to the model weights file

CompiledIntent.description: Compiled intent with embeddings for runtime use

embedder_component_id.description: ID of the embedder component to use

endpoint_override.description: Endpoint override for the remote knowledge

language_code.description: Optional language code, e.g., en, en-US, es-MX

default_timeout.description: Default timeout for the remote knowledge

model_weights_path.description: Path to the model weights file

jwt_token.description: JWT token for Paragon API authentication

GoogleSerperAPIClientCreationConfig.description: Google Serper API client creation configuration

api_key.description: API key for the Google Serper API

api_endpoint.description: API endpoint for the Google Serper API

default_timeout.description: Default timeout for the Google Serper API

Condition.description: Defines conditions that trigger a goal activation or completion

intents.description: List of intent identifiers that can trigger activation or completion

detect.description: Text description of the condition that must be met

required_goals.description: List of goals that must be completed before this goal can be activated

motivation.description: Motivation or purpose of the goal

repeatable.description: Whether the goal can be repeated

activation_condition.description: Conditions required to trigger this goal

completion_condition.description: Conditions required to complete this goal

phrases.description: List of training phrases for the intent

KeywordGroup.description: Keyword group definition for keyword matching

name.description: Unique identifier of the keyword group

keywords.description: List of keywords in the group

top_k.description: Number of top results to retrieve

TextContentItem.description: Text content item for multimodal messages

text.description: Text content, may contain Jinja templates

ImageUrlContentItem.description: Image URL content item for multimodal messages

url.description: Image URL, may contain Jinja templates

ContentItem.description: Content item for multimodal messages (text or image)

ToolCall.description: Tool call made by the model

id.description: Unique identifier for the tool call

name.description: Name of the tool to be called

args.description: Arguments for the tool call as a JSON string

MessageTemplate.description: Message template for chat. Content can be a string or array of content parts.

oneOf.description: Text content (may contain Jinja templates like {{variable}})
Array of content items for multimodal messages

tool_calls.description: Tool calls made by the assistant

tool_call_id.description: Tool call that this message is responding to (for role=tool)

Tool.description: Tool definition for LLM function calling

language_code.description: Language code for speech synthesis, e.g., en, en-US, es-MX

SpeechSynthesisPostprocessingConfig.description: Configuration for postprocessing the generated speech waveform

sample_rate.description: Sample rate for the output waveform

SpeechSynthesisInferenceConfig.description: Configuration for model inference parameters in TTS

temperature.description: The temperature of the model. Range (0, 2]. Higher temperature means more creative output.

speaking_rate.description: Speaking rate/speed, in the range [0.5, 1.5]. 1.0 is the normal native speed.

model_id.description: Model ID (v2 or v3) to choose model version

timestamp_type.description: Optional type of timestamp alignment to return. If not specified, no timestamps will be returned.

config.description: Configuration variant for different TTS providers

RetryConfig.description: Configuration for retry behavior on specific errors

max_attempts.description: Maximum number of attempts (including initial attempt)

handle_errors.description: Whitelist of error codes to retry. Empty means retry all errors (unless filtered by ignore_errors)

ignore_errors.description: Blacklist of error codes to exclude from retry. Defaults to kDefaultIgnoredErrors if not specified

CooldownConfig.description: Configuration for circuit breaker cooldown behavior

min_consecutive_failures.description: Minimum consecutive failures before entering cooldown

cooldown_duration.description: Duration to wait before retrying after cooldown (e.g., '3600s', '1h')

FallbackConfig.description: Configuration for fallback routing to alternative nodes

node_id.description: ID of the fallback node to route to

handle_errors.description: Whitelist of error codes that trigger this fallback. Empty means all errors

ignore_errors.description: Blacklist of error codes to exclude from this fallback. Defaults to kDefaultIgnoredErrors if not specified

NodeErrorConfig.description: Configuration for node error handling with retries, fallbacks, and circuit breaker

retries.description: List of retry configurations for different error types

fallbacks.description: List of fallback nodes to try in order when primary fails

cooldown.description: Common cooldown configuration for all fallbacks

report_to_client.description: Whether to report node execution result to the client

error_handling.description: Optional error handling configuration for the node

GoalAdvancementNodeCreationConfig.description: Configuration for creating goal advancement nodes

goals.description: List of goals for the node

GoalAdvancementNodeExecutionConfig.description: Configuration for executing goal advancement nodes

report_to_client.description: Whether to report node execution result to the client

error_handling.description: Optional error handling configuration for the node

llm_component_id.description: ID of the LLM component to use

intents.description: List of intents for the node

embedder_component_id.description: ID of the embedder component to use

llm_component_id.description: ID of the LLM component to use

report_to_client.description: Whether to report node execution result to the client

error_handling.description: Optional error handling configuration for the node

KeywordMatcherNodeCreationConfig.description: Configuration for creating keyword matcher nodes

keyword_groups.description: List of keyword groups for the node

EmbeddingMatcherNodeCreationConfig.description: Configuration for creating embedding matcher nodes

phrases.description: List of phrases to match against user input

embedder_component_id.description: ID of the embedder component to retrieve from ComponentRegistry

IntentStrictMatcherNodeCreationConfig.description: Configuration for creating intent strict match nodes

intents.description: List of intents for strict matching

Intent.StrictMatcherNodeCreationConfig.description: Configuration for creating intent strict matcher nodes

intents.description: List of intents for strict matching

Intent.EmbeddingMatcherNodeCreationConfi.description: Configuration for creating intent embedding matcher nodes

intents.description: List of intents for embedding-based matching

embedder_component_id.description: ID of the embedder component to retrieve from ComponentRegistry

Intent.LLMPromptVariablesBuilderNodeCrea.description: Configuration for creating intent LLM prompt variables builder nodes

intents.description: List of intents for LLM prompt variable building

knowledge_component_id.description: ID of the knowledge component to use

report_to_client.description: Whether to report node execution result to the client

error_handling.description: Optional error handling configuration for the node

knowledge_ids.description: List of knowledge base IDs to search

LLMChatNodeExecutionConfig.description: Configuration for executing LLM chat nodes

report_to_client.description: Whether to report node execution result to the client

error_handling.description: Optional error handling configuration for the node

llm_component_id.description: ID of the LLM component to use

message_templates.description: List of message templates for the chat

tools.description: List of tools available for function calling

tool_choice.description: Controls which tool is called by the model

type.description: The type of the tool: typically 'function'

name.description: The name of the function to be called

response_format.description: Format that the model must output. Defaults to text.

LLMChatRoutingNodeCreationConfig.description: Configuration for creating LLM chat routing nodes

default_timeout.description: Default timeout for LLM requests in seconds. Defaults to 30.

LLMChatRoutingNodeExecutionConfig.description: Configuration for executing LLM chat routing nodes

report_to_client.description: Whether to report node execution result to the client

error_handling.description: Optional error handling configuration for the node

llm_component_id.description: ID of the LLM component to use

error_handling.description: Optional error handling configuration for the node

canned_phrases.description: List of canned phrases to randomly select from

error_handling.description: Optional error handling configuration for the node

stt_component_id.description: ID of the STT component to use

TextClassifierNodeCreationConfig.description: Configuration for creating text classifier nodes

classifier_config.description: Configuration for creating the text classifier

tts_component_id.description: ID of the TTS component to use

voice.description: The voice to use for the TTSNode

synthesis_config.description: The speech synthesis configuration for the TTSNode

max_phrases_per_intent.description: Maximum number of phrases per intent to include

Intent.OutputNodeExecutionConfig.description: Configuration for executing intent output nodes

return_rolling_summary.description: Whether to include the rolling summary in the returned knowledge records
